channel.title: Account making
channel.description: how do i make a account w/o a website? for my server so i can make 1 for somone. if you anwser and its correct ill try, i will grant you the Co-Owner[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2008, 07:15:29 pm[/size][hr][quote="goddest"]how do i make a account w/o a website? for my server so i can make 1 for somone. if you anwser and its correct ill try, i will grant you the Co-Owner[/quote] and ill add to that, the first person thet go on my hamachi and mssgs me will be co-owner

item.title: Account making
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“goddest, post:1, topic:235391”]how do i make a account w/o a website? for my server so i can make 1 for somone. if you anwser and its correct ill try, i will grant you the Co-Owner[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2008, 07:15:29 pm[/size][hr][quote author=goddest link=topic=310439.msg2477693#msg2477693 date=1223341805]
how do i make a account w/o a website? for my server so i can make 1 for somone. if you anwser and its correct ill try, i will grant you the Co-Owner
[/quote] and ill add to that, the first person thet go on my hamachi and mssgs me will be co-owner[/quote]

…uuuumm type a username and password in the client…you don’t need a website. some people have been TRYING to make it where you have to sign up trough a website. altho i think it has been done before.

Read full topic

@barragey0uXD wrote:

You just fucking type a username of desire and password at client login and your done.
